title: temporarily disable account
content:
Suggestion: add a feature to allow Thunderbird to disable checking an account.

I have several Thunderbird accounts. Some of them need to be checked maybe once a month. Would like to disable those until I manually initiate a connection.
creator: hspindel

title: Unccouple outgoing email from reply emails
content: Emails received in reply seem to couple themselves under the original sent email. How do I tell Thunderbird to treat them as separate, and stored them in my inbox as a separate individual email. Thank for your advice. Kanga85
creator: kanga85

title: Thunderbird wants to download all 15,000 emails in my mailbox :(
content: I have been using Thunderbird for years and have never had any problems; unfortunately, from few days, every time I try to download my mail, thunderbird starts downloading all my 15,000 emails, even though they have already been downloaded and read. I am desperate... I don't know what to do. Please help me... thanks!
creator: rambof

title: My emails from my provider is not transferred to my Thunderbird account
content: My emails from my provider is not transferred to my Thunderbird account. What can I do?
